data.title: Shenety on LinkedIn: #zillacapital #saudi #kingdompulse
data.meta_description: With the expansion of Zilla Capital in Saudi, we are issuing "Kingdom Pulse" report couple of times a week, covering key local Saudi news and global related…
data.text:
Saudi aramco’s $12 billion share sale sold out shortly after the deal opened on Sunday, in a boon to the government that’s seeking funds to help pay for a massive economic transformation plan. The government had demand for all shares on offer in a few hours after books opened, according to terms of the deal seen by Bloomberg News. Books were covered across the price range of 26.70 riyals to 29 riyals, though it wasn’t immediately clear how much of the demand came from foreign investors. #saudiarabia #aramco #saudivision2030 #ipo #secondaryoffering #sharesale #investmentbanking #tadawul #capitalmarkets

PIF-Backed Oil Driller’s Saudi IPO Set to Raise $1.2 Billion ADES listing is set to be Saudi Arabia’s biggest of the year Offering was oversubscribed within hours of opening books ADES Holding Co.’s initial public offering is expected to price at the top of the range and raise $1.2 billion in what’s set to be Saudi Arabia’s biggest listing of the year. The share sale is expected to price at 13.50 riyals apiece and books are significantly oversubscribed at that level, according to terms of the deal seen by Bloomberg. The final price is set to be announced on Sept. 20. #business #finance #financialservices

almowazi is your gateway to unlisted, delisted and OTC companies. In this week's #marketmovers: * Refrigeration, Storage, and Oil Services Industries Company (RIC) (OTC 84 ) has recently commenced the distribution of 100% cash dividends. * AlMazaya Holding Company K.S.C.P. (Holding) and First Dubai Real Estate Development Company K.S.C.P. have reached an agreement for a merger. * United Oil Projects Co. (OTC 372) will propose the distribution of 15% cash dividends to shareholders at its upcoming #assemblymeeting, an increase from the 12% cash dividend received last year. * OTC 982 United Agricultural and Livestock Production Company, will deliberate on allowing the Board of Directors the authority to distribute cash dividends to the company's shareholders semi-annually or quarterly in 2024, based on its discretion. * The month of May had active #trading, with #unlisted and #delisted shares worth KD 11.9 million being traded. 146 million shares from 82 unlisted and delisted companies were traded this month through 503 deals. Notably, two unlisted companies in the education sector dominated the trading activity in terms of both volume and value. * Active trading was done by Gulf Rocks Co. (K.S.C) and Kuwait International Investment Company KSC this week. Sign up for our #weeklymarketupdate on our website. #marketintelligence #companynews #assemblymeeting #profitdistribution https://conta.cc/4e6CHib

Saudi Arabia has announced plans to sell 1.545 billion shares of aramco, which could raise $12 billion. In a statement, Aramco revealed that it plans to sell 0.64% of its shares with a price range between SAR26.70 and SAR29.00 per share. The offering comes after Aramco made its record-setting IPO in 2019, which raised $29.4 billion. The secondary public offering of Aramco’s ordinary shares will commence on Sunday, June 2, 2024, the statement added. Read more: https://lnkd.in/deenm9GF #SaudiArabia #Aramco #SaudiAramco #MarketShares #Economy #IPO

Back in 2021, UNITRADE INDUSTRIES BERHAD entrusted RDS Partnership’s Capital Markets and M&A team to be their IPO solicitors for their listing on the ACE Market of Bursa Securities in June 2022. Fast forward to 2023, RDS Partnership’s Capital Markets and M&A team led by Partner Ong Eu Jin is once again brought on board by Unitrade to be their M&A transaction and due diligence solicitors for their acquisition of 51% interest in Intergreen Metals Sdn Bhd, a metal waste recycling company, for RM66.3 million. Yesterday we witnessed both parties inking their agreement, signifying a strategic step forward by Unitrade by penetrating into the metal recycling space with prospects of delivering even greater value to the steel industry. This shows that a company’s IPO is just the beginning - looking forward to more ventures and endeavours by Unitrade! #M&A #RDSCapitalMarkets

Heart of the Compressors 💚🤍🖤❤️💚🤍🖤❤️💚🤍🖤❤️ KBDME Compressor Valves & Accessories FZCO. Dubai 🇦🇪Ajman🇦🇪 💚🤍🖤❤️💚🤍🖤❤️💚🤍🖤❤️ Compressor valves are often referred to as the heart of the compressor, crucial for regulating the flow of gases and ensuring efficient operation. The quality of these valves directly impacts the performance, reliability, and longevity of the compressor. High-quality valves ensure precise control over intake and discharge cycles, minimizing energy consumption and reducing the risk of leaks and pressure drops. Conversely, inferior valves can lead to inefficiencies, increased operational costs, and frequent maintenance issues. Therefore, maintenance at regular intervals with high-quality internals is essential for maintaining optimal performance and ensuring the longevity of the entire compressor system. www.KBDME.com 💚🤍🖤❤️💚🤍🖤❤️💚🤍🖤❤️

Saudi Aramco, the world's largest oil company, is considering a secondary share offering on the Riyadh stock exchange, aiming to sell a stake worth up to $50 billion. 🛢️ This move comes after discussions with potential investors, including multinational oil companies and sovereign-wealth funds. Notably, the decision to keep the offering in Riyadh is to steer clear of international legal complexities. 🌏 As we all know, Saudi Aramco completed the world's largest IPO back in 2019, raising an astounding $29.4 billion. Now, it seems they're gearing up for another significant move in the financial market. 💰 Stay tuned for more updates on this exciting development! 🚀 #SaudiAramco #StockMarket #Investments #OilIndustry #FinanceNews
